mapper.select: SELECT SUM(a.amount) AS amount, a.parent_id AS parentId, a.parent_name AS parentName, b.ali_item_type AS aliItemType FROM sb_order_item_ach a LEFT JOIN sb_category b ON a.parent_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY parentId
SELECT format(SUM(b.amount),2) FROM sb_order a LEFT JOIN sb_order_item_ach b ON a.id = b.order_id WHERE a.street_id = #{streetId} AND a.company_id != 1

SELECT b.parent_name AS type, round(SUM(b.amount),0) AS value FROM sb_order a inner JOIN sb_order_item_ach b ON a.id = b.order_id WHERE a.street_id = #{streetId} AND a.company_id != 1 GROUP BY b.parent_id
